QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_DETAIL.PATID, YRDOB, SES.D_RACE_CODE, GDR_CD, ELIGEFF, ELIGEND, CASE WHEN eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE eligeff END as startDate, 44814722 as PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 8527 WHEN 'A' THEN 8515 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 8516 ELSE 0 END as RaceConceptId, CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 0 WHEN 'A' THEN 0 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 38003563 WHEN 'B' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END as EthnicityConceptId, CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'A' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'B' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS RACE, CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'H' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS ETHNICITY, DIVISION, COALESCE(bus,'') + ' ' bus, CASE WHEN ASO = 'Y' THEN '(ASO) ' else '' END as aso, CASE WHEN PRODUCT = 'HMO' THEN 'Health Maint Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'PPO' THEN 'Preferred Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'EPO' THEN 'Exclusive Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'IND' THEN 'Indemnity ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'POS' THEN 'Point of Service ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'ALL' THEN 'National Ancillaries, All Products ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'UNK' THEN 'Unknown ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'OTH' THEN 'Other ' ELSE COALESCE(PRODUCT,'') END AS product, CASE WHEN CDHP = 1 THEN '(HRA)' WHEN CDHP = 2 THEN '(HSA)' ELSE '' END as cdhp, PAT_PLANID FROM {sc}.MEMBER_DETAIL LEFT JOIN {sc}.SES on MEMBER_DETAIL.PATID = SES.PATID JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND MEMBER_DETAIL.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID )
select *, LTRIM(bus) + LTRIM(aso) + LTRIM(product) + LTRIM(cdhp) as PayerSource from a order by PATID
